flawed_nl_solution:
The sell reduced the price of each pin by 20*0.15=$<<20*0.15=3>>3
So he paid 20-3=$<<20-3=17>>17 per pin
So the total cost was 17*10=$<<17*10=710>>710
#### 710

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 170, not 710. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
